document_data.name: ''Throne of the Coronal''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Throne of the Coronal''''' was the throne of the [[Coronal]] of [[Myth Drannor]].{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|269|14}}
document_data.Description: The throne was high-arched and floated above the circular, glowing Pool of Remembrance.
document_data.Powers:
The Throne itself hovered over the Pool of Remembrance on its own power.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|276-277|14}}

The Throne of the Coronal had a number of powers, which could be called upon by the [[mantle (Cormathan)|mantle]] of the [[Coronal]] when they were close by.{{Cite dragon annual/1997/The magic of Myth Drannor|90}} Such powers included the ability to bar any liquid or vapor, from rain to [[green dragon]]'s breath, from anywhere within a small area centered on the throne or mantle, and a few [[evocation]] spells such as ''[[flame strike]]''.{{cite web/Candlekeep Forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2013)/05-18 Coronal's Thrones}}
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|241}}, [[Coronal]] [[Eltargrim Irithyl]] was forced to call upon the ''lightshock wave'' to quell the noise in the chamber. It also blocked a [[dagger]] thrown at him.
